exercises.name: Quad Sets
exercises.instructions: Tighten the thigh muscle while the leg is straight. Hold 5 seconds, relax.

exercises.name: Straight Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Keep knee straight, lift leg slowly, pause, then lower with control.

exercises.name: Heel Slides
exercises.instructions: Slide heel toward hips to bend the knee, then return to start.

exercises.name: Terminal Knee Extension
exercises.instructions: Straighten knee fully against light resistance, then return slowly.
